remarks: The composition (product) of trace-preserving endormorphisms is nonzero when each argument is nonzero.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2013.)
statement:
tendoid0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendoid0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoid0.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoid0.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoid0.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendoconid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ U =/= O ) /\ ( V e. E /\ V =/= O ) ) -> ( U o. V ) =/= O ) $.
$d B f $.
$d T f $.
